授業目的: The purpose of this course is to introduce students to the TOEFL exam and give practice and guidance in understanding the test.
到達目標:
Students will be able to understand the requirements of each section of the test
Students will be able to recognize the various types of question used in the sections of the test
Students will be able to target an approximate TOEFL ITP score of 500 or higher and TOEFL IBT score of 61 or higher.
特記事項: この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。
授業方法:
Small group work
Pair work
Some teacher-led instruction

第1回: Students are given an IELTS homework pack to be completed and handed-in on the final class.
